Groups.Title: Common
Groups.Subtitle: Common Samples
Groups.Description: Demonstrates common uses of the player framework

Items.Title: Progressive video
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates basic playback of progressive download video.

Items.Title: Playlists
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates playlist support.

Items.Title: Player Framework settings
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates a number of the settings that can be used to control the PlayerFramework.

Items.Title: Error handling UI
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates the built-in error handler UI.

Items.Title: Poster image
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates showing a poster image.

Items.Title: Click to play
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates the built-in click to play feature to allow users to only start download once the user clicks.

Items.Title: Classic theme
Items.Subtitle: Uses the IE default browser look and feel.

Items.Title: Phone theme
Items.Subtitle: Uses the Windows Phone 8 video theme.

Items.Title: Entertainment theme
Items.Subtitle: Uses the Windows Entertainment app theme.

Groups.Title: Adaptive
Groups.Subtitle: Adaptive Streaming Samples
Groups.Description: Demonstrates the various ways to use the smooth streaming SDK to support adaptive streaming

Items.Title: MPEG-DASH streaming video
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates basic playback of the new W3C adaptive streaming technology called DASH.

Items.Title: HLS streaming video
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates basic playback of the Apple HLS (Http Live Streaming) format.

Groups.Title: Captions
Groups.Subtitle: Closed Caption Samples
Groups.Description: Demonstrates the various ways to use the player framework's closed captioning and subtitles feature

Items.Title: WebVTT captions (side car)
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates playing WebVTT captions.

Items.Title: TTML captions (side car)
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates TTML closed captions/subtitles.

Groups.Title: Advertising
Groups.Subtitle: Advertising Samples
Groups.Description: Demonstrates the various ways to use the player framework's advertising feature

Items.Title: Schedule VAST ads
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates playing a VAST preroll, midroll, and postroll

Items.Title: VMAP ad scheduling
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates using VMAP to schedule ads

Items.Title: FreeWheel SmartXML
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates using FreeWheel's Smart XML to schedule and play ads

Items.Title: MAST ad scheduling
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates scheduling ads using MAST (Media Abstract Sequencing Template)

Items.Title: Schedule simple clip
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates how to schedule a simple clip (not VAST)

Items.Title: Programmatic ad
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates how to programmatically schedule and play an ad

Items.Title: Nonlinear ad
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates playing a VAST file that contains a linear and nonlinear ad

Items.Title: Ad pod
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates a VAST ad pod using VAST

Items.Title: Companion ads
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates how to play an ad with companions

Items.Title: Thumbnails
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates how to show thumbnails during scrubbing, RW, & FF operations.

Items.Title: Tracking
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates how to get tracking events for analytics purposes.

Items.Title: Timeline Markers
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates showing visual markers in the timeline that the user can seek to.

Items.Title: Local playback
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates playing a local video and capturing input from the webcam.

Items.Title: Play To
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates how to use Play To, to enable users to stream media to a target device.

Items.Title: Suspend & resume
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates how to suspend and resume the player.
